title: Crawl Wiki
data:
{| style="width:80%"; |- style="vertical-align:top;" |This is a community-edited encyclopedia for the open source [[roguelike]] game [[Dungeon Crawl]], focusing on the actively developed Stone Soup branch. To create an account, see [[How to help]]; the normal account creation method is disabled. Crawl may seem easier than many other roguelikes at first glance, but dig a little deeper and you'll find it's just as challenging as some of the most difficult variations out there and a good deal harder than the rest. A strong set of [https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/master/crawl-ref/docs/crawl_manual.rst#n-philosophy-pas-de-faq design philosophies] makes it much friendlier (and generally fairer) to the player - deaths are a learning experience instead of an exercise in frustration. Crawl also sports a number of systems and mechanics that diverge from more traditional roguelikes. For example, there's less emphasis on character classes (or [[background]]s in Crawl parlance); your character is defined more by their [[skills]], [[species]] and choice of [[God|deity]] than their background. While Crawl includes an in-game [[tutorial]] and [https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/master/crawl-ref/docs/crawl_manual.rst manual] in the name of providing something playable without the aid of a guide or wiki, the finer details and nuances are left open to discovery by the player. Since there is so much to find, we need your help to maintain this site. If you find something interesting that's missing, spot an error, or just want to help, please sign up. For those of you who have never added to or edited a wiki before, don't worry! It's not very challenging and there's a very useful [[Help:Contents|help section]] explaining how to get started. Head over to the [[CrawlWiki_talk:Community portal|Community discussion page]] to see what is going on at the moment, or take a look at some of the [[Current projects|projects]] we're working on. You may also wish to visit the [https://crawl.develz.org/ official homepage] of Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup, or go [https://crawl.develz.org/download.htm directly to the download] of the most recent version. | style="width:20%;"| {{register_header}} |} {{spoiler}} {{version list}} {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin:0em 0em 1em 0em; width:100%; background-color:white" | style="width:50%; vertical-align:top; border:1px solid #abd5f5; background-color:#99FFFF;" |

[[Playing online | Play ''Crawl'' Online Now]]
'''North America Servers''' *[http://crawl.akrasiac.org:8080/ CAO] - Located in Arizona. Hosts all versions from [[0.11]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]]. *[https://cbro.berotato.org/ CBR2] - Located in Ohio. Hosts all versions from [[0.24]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]]. *[https://crawl.dcss.io/ CDI] - Located in New York. Hosts all versions from [[0.30]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]]. '''European Servers''' *[https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/howto CDO] - Located in Germany. Hosts all versions from [[0.10]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]] (console only). *[http://underhound.eu:8080/ CUE] - Located in Amsterdam, Netherlands. Hosts all versions from [[0.10]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]]. *[http://crawl.xtahua.com/ CXC] - Located in France. Hosts all versions from [[0.14]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]]. '''Asian Servers''' *[https://crawl.nemelex.cards/ CNC] - Located in Korea. Hosts all versions from [[0.11]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]] (WebTiles only). *[http://lazy-life.ddo.jp:8080/ LLD] - Located in Japan. Hosts all versions from [[0.13]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]] (WebTiles only). '''Australian Server''' *[https://crawl.project357.org/ CPO] - Located in Sydney. Hosts all versions from [[0.16]] to [[0.32]], and [[trunk]] (WebTiles only). Will be retired in the near future unless a new owner is found.
